name: Disabled Community Health Clinic (DCHC)
short_desc: Outpatient rehabilitation for people with physical disabilities, including those recovering from brain or spinal cord injuries and those with cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, post-polio and other chronic conditions
description: Offers outpatient rehabilitation to people with physical disabilities, including those recovering from brain or spinal cord injuries and those with cerebral palsy, multiple sclerosis, post-polio and other chronic conditions. Coordinates referrals to physical, occupational, and speech therapy, stress patient and family training and education, and provide referrals to community resources, maximizing a patientâ€™s potential for independence.
